function.name: dbase_close
function.description: Closes an open dBase-format database file.

function.name: dbase_get_record
function.description: Returns an array representing a record from the database.

function.name: dbase_delete_record
function.description: Marks a record to be deleted.

function.name: dbase_get_record_with_names
function.description: Returns an associative array representing a record from the database.

function.name: dbase_numrecords
function.description: Returns the number of records in the database.

function.name: dbase_pack
function.description: Packs the database (deletes records marked for deletion).

function.name: dbase_add_record
function.description: Adds a record to the database.

function.name: dbase_replace_record
function.description: Replaces a record to the database.

function.name: dbase_numfields
function.description: Returns the number of fields (columns) in the database.

function.name: dbase_create
function.description: Creates a new dBase-format database file.

function.name: dbase_get_header_info
function.description: Gets the header info of a database.
